title: too many champs cost 6300 IP, please lower some of them to other bracket.
body:

Riot wants to make money.
It used to be fun and amazing, working up the IP and unlocking champs before season 1 even started. Now, there's way too many champions for pricing to be listed that heavily.

Well, everytime a new champ comes out they reduce the price of a 6300 one to 4800, so the number of 6300 champions actually remains constant. And every number of releases they also reduce lower price champions to the lower bracket. For example, with Kayn they just reduced Kha'Zix's price to 4800 and Mordekaiser's from 3150 to 1350.

The vast majority of their revenue comes from skins, there's no reason all champions shouldn't be free. It's probably a psychological gamble that limited champs leads to more "maining" which leads to more skin sales. Either that or they think their player base is too dumb to have all champs available (very likely).
